title: Special Bath Bundle
description: Transform your bath time into a spa-like retreat with our luxurious Special Bath Bundle. This thoughtfully curated set includes everything you need to relax, refresh, and rejuvenate after a long day. Inside, you'll find a soothing blend of bath essentials—aromatherapy bath salts, a rich foaming body wash, a soft exfoliating sponge, and a calming lavender candle to set the perfect mood. Ideal as a gift or a personal treat, this bundle is your ticket to ultimate self-care.

title: Special Bundle - Period Pack
description: Take care of yourself with comfort and confidence during your cycle with our Special Bundle – Period Pack. This essential kit is designed to support you through your period with soothing, practical, and comforting items that make a real difference. Whether you’re at home, at work, or on the go, this bundle has your back—because you deserve extra care, every month.

title: Facial Toner Mist - Witch Hazel with Lavender
description: Refresh and hydrate your skin with our Facial Toner Mist, infused with soothing witch hazel and calming lavender. Ideal for setting makeup or a mid-day skin boost.

title: Wild Hare Solid Shampoo - Tutti Frutti
description: Brighten your hair routine with the Wild Hare Solid Shampoo in a juicy Tutti Frutti scent. This eco-friendly bar gently cleanses while leaving your hair soft and smelling delightful.

title: Honeysuckle Fragrance Candle
description: Fill your space with the sweet, floral scent of our Honeysuckle Fragrance Candle. Hand-poured and long-lasting, it's perfect for creating a relaxing atmosphere.

title: Organic Hair Serum - Carrot Seed
description: Nourish and protect your hair with our Organic Hair Serum featuring carrot seed oil. Ideal for dry or damaged hair, it adds shine and promotes a healthy scalp.

title: Bamboo & Linen Bath Sponge - Charcoal
description: Gently exfoliate and cleanse with our Bamboo & Linen Bath Sponge infused with charcoal. Naturally antibacterial and eco-friendly, perfect for a refreshing bath experience.

title: Bamboo Sanitary Towels
description: Stay fresh and confident with our ultra-soft, eco-friendly Bamboo Sanitary Towels. Breathable, absorbent, and biodegradable, better for you and the planet.

title: Clay Face Mask
description: Detoxify and rejuvenate your skin with our all-natural Clay Face Mask. Perfect for drawing out impurities and leaving your skin feeling smooth and radiant.

title: Toiletry Bag - Natural
description: Keep your essentials organized with our minimalist Toiletry Bag in natural cotton. Durable, spacious, and ideal for travel or everyday use.

title: Essential Oil Bath Bomb - Chamomile & Grapefruit
description: Unwind with our Essential Oil Bath Bomb, blending calming chamomile with uplifting grapefruit. A fizzy, fragrant escape for your next bath.

title: Greenman Soap - Gentle and Kind
description: Treat your skin to the gentle touch of Greenman Soap. Made with natural ingredients, it's kind to your skin and perfect for daily cleansing.
